amendment.description: Sec.___. The amounts otherwise provided by this Act are revised by reducing the amount made available for "Department of Energy--Energy Programs--Fossil Energy Research and Development", and increasing the amount made available for "Corps of Engineers-Civil--Department of the Army--Corps of Engineers-Civil--Construction", by $20,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the Department of Army Corps of Engineers funds by $20,000,000, and decrease the Fossil fuel research program by $20,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lynch amendment (A045) Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 206 (Roll no. 338).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lynch amendment (A045) Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 206 (Roll no. 338).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A045) offered by Mr. Lynch.
